Class AnimalArrayList

java.lang.Object
AnimalArrayList
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnimalList
public class AnimalArrayList extends Object implements AnimalList
Implementation of AnimalList that uses an array-based approach. An array is grown with the list as the list grows, and a seperate size variable allows for array length to exceed list length.
Version:
02/10/2024
Author:
Jackson Eshbaugh
